body:
[Stairs]: There's a staircase leading up to the next floor. You're not sure if you can make it. 

[1]: [Climb the stairs] 
[2]: [Don't climb the stairs]
title: Start1

body:
[Forbearance]: "Hey, are you sure you want to do this? I don't think we can make it." 

[1]: "I'm sure, let's go!" 
[2]: "You're right, let's not do this."
title: Climb1

body:
[Forbearance]: "I warned you, we can't climb those stairs."
 (-1 Health) 

[1]: "I'm sorry, I won't do it again." 
[2]: "Come on, there's not way we can't make it."
title: Climb2

body:
[Forbearance]: "I'm sorry, I can't do this anymore. I'm leaving. WE are leaving." 

[1]: "I'm sorry."
title: Climb3
